statements: SELECT * FROM protected_area_species WHERE species_category = 'Mammal';
SELECT species_name, species_population FROM protected_area_species WHERE species_category = 'Bird' ORDER BY species_population DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM protected_area_species WHERE species_population > 1000;
SELECT * FROM protected_area_species WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_species FROM protected_area_species;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM protected_area_species;
SELECT * FROM protected_area_species ORDER BY species_name DESC, species_category ASC;
SELECT species_name, species_category, species_population FROM protected_area_species WHERE species_population > 1000;
SELECT species_name, species_population FROM protected_area_species WHERE species_population > 500 ORDER BY species_population DESC;
SELECT COUNT(species_id) AS total_species, MAX(species_population) AS max_population FROM protected_area_species;
SELECT * FROM SpeciesDistribution WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM SpeciesDistribution WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT area_name, location FROM ProtectedAreas WHERE designated_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SpeciesDistribution ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM SpeciesDistribution WHERE population_size < 5000;
SELECT * FROM SpeciesDistribution WHERE population_size > 100 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, habitat_type FROM SpeciesDistribution WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, location FROM ProtectedAreas WHERE designated_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProtectedAreas WHERE location LIKE '%National Park%';
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM SpeciesDistribution WHERE population_size BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY population_size DESC, species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM Species WHERE species_category = 'Mammal';
SELECT area_name, area_size FROM ProtectedArea WHERE area_size > 1000;
SELECT species_name, area_name, distribution_count FROM Species s JOIN SpeciesDistribution sd ON s.species_id = sd.species_id JOIN ProtectedArea pa ON sd.area_id = pa.area_id;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM Species;
SELECT * FROM ProtectedArea ORDER BY area_name DESC;

SELECT species_name, area_name, distribution_count FROM Species s INNER JOIN SpeciesDistribution sd ON s.species_id = sd.species_id INNER JOIN ProtectedArea pa ON sd.area_id = pa.area_id WHERE pa.area_size > 1000;

SELECT species_name, area_name, distribution_count FROM Species s INNER JOIN SpeciesDistribution sd ON s.species_id = sd.species_id INNER JOIN ProtectedArea pa ON sd.area_id = pa.area_id WHERE species_category = 'Birds';

SELECT pa.area_name, SUM(sd.distribution_count) AS total_distribution FROM SpeciesDistribution sd INNER JOIN ProtectedArea pa ON sd.area_id = pa.area_id GROUP BY pa.area_name HAVING total_distribution > 5000 ORDER BY total_distribution DESC;
SELECT * FROM species LIMIT 10;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM species;
SELECT * FROM protected_area WHERE area_size > 1000;
SELECT area_name FROM protected_area WHERE location='Forest';
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM researcher ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT area_name, area_size FROM protected_area WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT DISTINCT s.species_name, p.area_name FROM species s JOIN species_distribution sd ON s.species_id = sd.species_id JOIN protected_area p ON sd.area_id = p.area_id WHERE p.area_size > 1000;
SELECT r.researcher_name, r.specialization, p.area_name FROM researcher r JOIN protected_area p ON r.area_id = p.area_id ORDER BY r.researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM species ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM species_location JOIN protected_area ON species_location.location_id = protected_area.area_id;
SELECT area_name, area_size, area_type FROM protected_area ORDER BY area_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, species_category, population_size FROM species ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM protected_area WHERE area_type = 'National Park';

SELECT species.species_name, area_ranger.ranger_name FROM species JOIN area_species_population ON species.species_id = area_species_population.species_id JOIN area_ranger ON area_ranger.area_id = area_species_population.area_id;
SELECT species.species_name, species_category, population_size, location_name FROM species JOIN species_location ON species.species_id = species_location.species_id ORDER BY population_size DESC;
